mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO class ( teacher_img_org, education, area, branch, subject, level, timezone, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat, sun, teacher1, teacher2, startday, endday, postday, cname, detail, time, price ) VALUES ( #{teacher_img_org}, #{education}, #{area}, #{branch}, #{subject}, #{level}, #{timezone}, #{mon}, #{tue}, #{wed}, #{thu}, #{fri}, #{sat}, #{sun}, #{teacher1}, #{teacher2}, #{startday}, #{endday}, NOW(), #{cname}, #{detail}, #{time}, #{price} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
